00005 OutgoingClient::OutgoingClient(RequestQueue* queue) :
00006     _outgoingQueue(queue),
00007     _shutdown(false)
00008 {
00009     pthread_mutex_init(&_runMutex, NULL);
00010     pthread_mutex_init(&_queueMutex, NULL);
00011 }

00014 OutgoingClient::setOutgoingQueue(RequestQueue* queue)
00015 {

00019 void
00020 OutgoingClient::addServer(int32_t serverId,
00021                           std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds,
00022                           std::string serverAddress,
00023                           int32_t serverPort)
00024 {
00025     RemoteServer* server = new RemoteServer(serverAddress, serverPort);
00026 
00027     _serverMap.insert(std::pair<int32_t, RemoteServer*>(serverId, server));
00028 
00029     for (int32_t i = 0; i < serviceIds.size(); i++) {
00030         _serviceMap.insert(std::pair<int32_t, RemoteServer*>(serviceIds[i], server));
00031     }
00032 }
00033 
00034 void
00035 OutgoingClient::removeServer(int32_t serverId)
00036 {
00037     RemoteServer* server = _serverMap.find(serverId)->second;
00038     std::map<int32_t, RemoteServer*>::iterator it;
00039 
00040     if (server == NULL) {
00041         return;
00042     }
00043     
00044     for (std::map<int32_t, RemoteServer*>::iterator it = _serviceMap.begin();
00045          it != _serviceMap.end();
00046          it++) {
00047         if (server = it->second) {
00048             _serviceMap.erase(it);
00049         }
00050     }
00051     
00052     it = _serverMap.find(serverId);
00053     _serverMap.erase(it);
00054 
00055     delete server;
00056     server = NULL;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void
00060 OutgoingClient::run()
00061 {
00062     // Check the run mutex, can only be running once
00063     int runfailed = -1;
00064     struct timespec check_timeout;
00065     clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &check_timeout);
00066 
00067     runfailed = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&_runMutex, &check_timeout);
00068 
00069     if (runfailed) {
00070         return;
00071     }
00072 
00073     _outgoingQueue->queueLock(&_queueMutex);
00074 
00075     while(!_shutdown) {
00076         struct timespec timeout;
00077         int result = -1;
00078 
00079         clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &timeout);
00080         timeout.tv_sec += 10; // Wait 10 seconds for timeout
00081 
00082         result = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&_queueMutex, &timeout);
00083 
00084         // timedlock returns 0 on success, other on error/timeout
00085         if (!result) {
00086             processOutgoingQueue();
00087 
00088             pthread_mutex_unlock(&_queueMutex);
00089             _outgoingQueue->queueLock(&_queueMutex);
00090         }
00091     }
00092 
00093     pthread_mutex_unlock(&_runMutex);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void
00097 OutgoingClient::shutdown()
00098 {
00099     _shutdown = true;
00100 }
00101 
00102 void
00103 OutgoingClient::processOutgoingQueue()
00104 {
00105     // Process all the known service ids that are pending being sent
00106     std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds = _outgoingQueue->getServiceIds();
00107 
00108     for (int32_t i = 0; i < serviceIds.size(); i++) {
00109         if (_serviceMap.find(serviceIds[i]) != _serviceMap.end()) {
00110             RemoteServer* server = _serviceMap.find(serviceIds[i])->second;
00111             std::queue<queueItem*> items;
00112             
00113             items = _outgoingQueue->getItemQueue(serviceIds[i]);
00114 
00115             while (!items.empty()) {
00116                 queueItem item;
00117                 item.methodId = items.front()->methodId;
00118                 item.serverId = items.front()->serverId;
00119                 item.argList = items.front()->argList;
00120                 items.pop();
00121                 
00122                 server->sendRequest(serviceIds[i], item);
00123             }
00124         }
00125     }
00126 
00127     // Process all the items with a service id of 0 (unknown)
00128     std::queue<queueItem*> serverItems;
00129     serverItems = _outgoingQueue->getItemQueue(0);
00130 
00131     while (!serverItems.empty()) {
00132         queueItem item;
00133         item.methodId = serverItems.front()->methodId;
00134         item.serverId = serverItems.front()->serverId;
00135         item.argList = serverItems.front()->argList;
00136         serverItems.pop();
00137         
00138         if (_serverMap.find(item.serverId) != _serverMap.end()) {
00139             RemoteServer* server = _serverMap.find(item.serverId)->second;
00140             server->sendRequest(0, item);
00141         }
00142     }
00143 }
